participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Shy and introverted, Alex prefers the comfort of her home and immerses herself in the virtual worlds of roleplaying games. She is sensitive and often feels overwhelmed by strong emotions.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Vivacious and spirited, Amina loves expressing herself through dance and values freedom highly. She has a resilient spirit shaped by her challenging past.
participant_2.background: i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a. i was born in somalia.

content.text: Hello. My life is great now
do you have the summers off
